Description: Google Classroom is a free blended learning platform developed by Google for educational institutions that aims to simplify creating, distributing, and grading assignments
Name: Google Classroom - Workspace

Methods.Name: Get Teacher
Methods.Description: Get teacher of a course.

Methods.Name: Delete Teacher
Methods.Description: Remove a teacher from a course.

Methods.Name: Create Teacher
Methods.Description: Create a teacher of a course.

Methods.Name: List Teachers
Methods.Description: List all teachers of a course.

Methods.Name: List Students
Methods.Description: List all students of a course.

Methods.Name: Create Student
Methods.Description: Add a student to a course.

Methods.Name: Delete Student
Methods.Description: Remove a student from a course.

Methods.Name: Get Student
Methods.Description: Get student of a course.

Methods.Name: Get Coursework
Methods.Description: Get coursework of a course.

Methods.Name: List Coursework
Methods.Description: List all coursework of a course.

Methods.Name: Get Student Submission
Methods.Description: Get a student submission of a course.

Methods.Name: List Student Submissions
Methods.Description: List all student submissions of a course.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: List all users in an organization. Search possible with additional query terms.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Update a user.

Methods.Name: Create User
Methods.Description: Create a user.

Methods.Description: Get a course.

Methods.Description: Create a course.
